name: MiwaRio Special Valentine
description:
Hello!

This is my personal work and some assets in it isn't mine! You can check out my Facebook account Salsabilla Azzahra for the background and bgm credits!

Play as Miwaki and choose to say your feeling out loud or keep it for some more years. Is very short and only had 2 endings. But the way we go to the each endings are many!

Don't hesitate to choose because there's no bad ending!

Enjoy!
